thread:
Researchers explore LLMs' potential in reverse-engineering black-box systems using passive observation and active intervention. 🔍🤖 #AIResearch #MachineLearning
 Link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.17968
Drum roll 🥁 New black-box tasks inspire AI research. #AIresearch #CognitiveScience
Researchers find that allowing LLMs to intervene boosts their performance. 🧠💡 #AIResearch #LLMs
New study shows interventions work best for original model 🧠 #AIResearch #LLM
The study links LLM reverse-engineering to reinforcement learning and cognitive science, emphasizing active learning’s role in scientific discovery. 🧠🤖 #AIResearch
